trans-unit.source: Specifies the action that occurs when a workflow becomes idle when persistence is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Specifica l'azione che si verifica quando un flusso di lavoro diventa inattivo quando la persistenza è consentita.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> function is invoked when the scheduler has no more pending work items and the workflow runtime can persist.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>funzione viene richiamata quando l'utilità di pianificazione ha non più elementi di lavoro in sospeso e il runtime del flusso di lavoro può rendere persistente.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> function is invoked when persistence is not allowed, and both <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> and <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> are invoked in that order when persistence is allowed.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che il <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>funzione viene richiamata quando la persistenza non è consentita ed entrambi <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>e <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>vengono richiamati nell'ordine specificato quando la persistenza è consentita.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Idle%2A>

trans-unit.source: None is the default action if no <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A> handler is provided.
trans-unit.target: Non è l'azione predefinita se non <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>gestore viene fornito.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.PersistableIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that no action is taken.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che viene eseguita alcuna azione.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"></xref> should persist the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che il <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"> </xref> deve essere persistente il flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"></xref> should persist and unload the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che il <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"> </xref> deve mantenere e scaricare il flusso di lavoro.
